name: Abbey Turnbull - Lytton Abandoned
description:
Explore Fort Lytton in a post apocalyptic world and examine if the building is stable enough for refuge. 

Prototype Interactions currently include:

- Picking up and moving objects with the Grip controls.

- Showing information by clicking on orbs through the Trigger controls.

Disclaimer: The grass had to be removed as there were file size issues
